column1: 4231,Aged and Disabled Carers,,"Administer health care or medical treatments
column9: Support individuals with diverse needs to understand, access and utilise information or services
column11: Provide counsel, comfort or encouragement to individuals or families
column13: Transport patients to and from medical facilities
column15: Act as an advocate or communicator regarding the cultural, diversity or accessibility needs of others
column17: Monitor health or behaviour of people
column19: Maintain a working understanding of the cultural, diversity and accessibility needs of others, and how this applies to the role
column25: Deliver inclusive and accessible programs, policies or services
column27: Develop plans for programs or services
column31: Maintain client information or service records",0.1602194604850038
